summary: Outkast was a popular American hip-hop duo from Atlanta, Georgia, made up of Big Boi and Andr√© 3000. They started as high school friends in the early '90s and became one of the most influential and successful hip-hop groups. Outkast's music combined rap with other genres like funk and jazz, and they were known for their creative lyrics and catchy melodies. They released several hit albums and singles, winning many awards, including six Grammys. After breaking up in 2007, they briefly reunited in 2014 for special performances.
title: Outkast
